comment: Oh, so now Robert DeNiro got a bomb, too. Riiiiiiiiiiiiiight... CNN would have you believe some right winger is so angry they sent bombs to all these politicians....Soros...AND DeNiro? Why didn't Madonna get one? Joy Behar?? Sure...not buying this bullshit.
amr:
# ::snt Oh, so now Robert DeNiro got a bomb, too. Riiiiiiiiiiiiiight... CNN would have you believe some right winger is so angry they sent bombs to all these politicians....Soros...AND DeNiro? Why didn't Madonna get one? Joy Behar?? Sure...not buying this bullshit.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Robert"
                              :op2 "DeNiro"))
                  :ARG1 (b / bomb)
                  :time (n2 / now)
                  :mod (t / too))
            :mod (o / oh
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / publication
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "CNN"))
            :ARG1 (b2 / believe-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (a / anger-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / person
                              :ARG1-of (r / right-08)
                              :mod (s2 / some)
                              :ARG1-of a)
                        :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG1 p3
                              :ARG3 (s3 / so)
                              :ARG6 (s4 / send-01
                                    :ARG0 p3
                                    :ARG1 (b3 / bomb)
                                    :ARG2 (p4 / politician
                                          :mod (t2 / this)
                                          :mod (a2 / all))))))
            :ARG2 y)
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op2 (p5 / person
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Soros"))
            :op4 (g2 / get-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (p6 / person
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "Madonna"))
                  :ARG1 (b4 / bomb))
            :op5 (p7 / person
                  :name (n6 / name
                        :op1 "Joy"
                        :op2 "Behar"))
            :op6 (b5 / buy-05
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (b6 / bullshit
                        :mod t2))
            :ARG1-of (s5 / sure-02)))
